mapper.update: UPDATE user u JOIN ( SELECT o.user_id, SUM(b.price * ob.book_count) AS totalPrice FROM `order` o INNER JOIN order_book ob ON o.id = ob.order_id INNER JOIN book b ON ob.book_id = b.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY o.user_id ) AS user_total_price ON u.id = user_total_price.user_id SET u.role = CASE WHEN user_total_price.totalPrice >= 300000 THEN 'DIAMOND' WHEN user_total_price.totalPrice >= 100000 THEN 'GOLD' WHEN user_total_price.totalPrice >= 5000 THEN 'SILVER' ELSE u.role END WHERE u.role != 'ADMIN';
